Text:
now that universal reissued this, this is precious.
Thank you!
Nice but I do hear some sissing in the background.. Or is this normal and always when listening to vinyls?
Thank you for breaking the seal and sharing mr hairpickl :)

WENKERBOY, yes, that sissing in the background that you say is perfectly normal when listening to vinyls.
by the way, thanks for sharing this with us! ;) beautiful music!
just a important point, now that i started listening to this: it's missing the fourth movement of the fifth sonata, the spring sonata. :S
